title.en: The Servant Who Suffers for Others

en: Isaiah describes a servant who bears suffering for many.
This is one of the clearest prophetic pictures of substitution.

lines: The servant is lifted up, yet he is marred and rejected.
He carries sorrows that are not his own.
He is wounded because of others’ wrongdoing.

question.en: What stands out to you about why the servant suffers?
